ssa-disability-insurance.title: Social Security Disability Insurance
ssa-disability-insurance.headline: Social Security Disability Insurance
ssa-disability-insurance.source.name: Social Security Administration
ssa-disability-insurance.summary: Social Security Disability Insurance provides financial assistance to people with disabilities. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.
ssa-disability-insurance.criticalApplica: A single SSA benefit application will be used to apply to all SSA benefits, but eligibility and approval will be determined for individual benefits.
